爛.definition: soft; mushy; well-cooked and soft; to rot; to decompose; rotten; worn out; chaotic; messy; utterly; thoroughly; crappy; bad

爛大街.definition: (coll.) (of a fashion item, song etc) to be everywhere now; to be nothing special anymore; to have lost its novelty

爛好人.definition: sb who tries to be on good terms with everyone

爛尾.definition: (of a construction project etc) unfinished; derailed (due to critical setbacks)

爛尾樓.definition: uncompleted building; building whose construction has run into difficulties and stopped

爛泥扶不上牆.pinyin: làn ní fú bù shàng qiáng

爛泥糊不上牆.pinyin: làn ní hú bù shàng qiáng
爛泥糊不上牆.definition: see 爛泥扶不上牆|烂泥扶不上墙[lan4 ni2 fu2 bu4 shang4 qiang2]

爛舌頭.definition: to gossip; to blab; a blab-mouth

爛賬.definition: disorganized accounts; uncollectable debts; bad debt

爛醉如泥.definition: (idiom) to be dead drunk; to be plastered
